attributes.title: this app is a no from me
attributes.review: when i first opened the app i saw a racist, petofile, and hater, donald trump isn’t fit to president and this app is disgusting, i hate him and everyone who likes him, its not a matter of differences when it comes to supporting donald trump, it’s simply like this FOR ME, if you support Donald J. Trump, you can’t be my friend and we can’t talk PERIOD!

attributes.title: One word ... AWFUL!
attributes.review: This app was supposed to be a good time. A place for honest and real news, a safe haven from all the liars. Sadly all I found was horrible, awful things. Things so despicable that I’m afraid if I saw it, they’ll take my review down and not inforM the public. Will not recommend to anyone, even Satan himself.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrendous 🤢🤢🤮🤮👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
attributes.review: Awful app, terrible set up. The diaper child man is terrifying and made me throw my phone across the room in terror. Information is false and will lead to the destruction and downfall of this country. Hundreds of thousands of people’s lives will be harmed if the claims that are being made come to fruition. Disgusting and scarring DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Just pure trash
attributes.review: I was just trying to download this app so I could get some campaign updates and whatnot but the load time was garbage and the whole product is just trash all around honestly this app should just be deleted entirely and I wouldn’t recommend this to a single soul

attributes.title: horrible ... JUST HORRIBLE . if I could rate zero stars I would
attributes.review: I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! They hacked into my accounts and drained my bank accounts. Trump is stealing money from people who download the app. He does not care about the people especially the whites. He is brainwashing us into thinking he is a good president. I am so ashamed of what he became. I WANT MY MONEY BACK 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: This app gave my device a virus
attributes.review: The moment I download this app my phone got a virus. I saw a very strange man who I believe has a mental illness wanting to be president. He was a fat man with a wig and looked a lot like Cheeto. But I couldn’t believe my eyes when he kept ranting about being president. This app disgusts me I would like it be removed

attributes.title: Very no good
attributes.review: I wanted to download the app to support the orange man but as soon as I opened it it crashed😤. About 20 minutes after that tragic incident it stole what was left of my fridge. Kicked me to the ground and said I was smelly😭. I was so distraught by this horrible act that I laid on the ground until I got up. I DO NOT recommend getting this app!!!

attributes.title: disappointing
attributes.review:
i opened the app up to hope
of something more. the tech quality is terrible, it took multiple tries to get my phone number i am disgusted that this is the quality of a app a president would make. Obama could probably do better

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to reserve seats for rallies but o wasn’t able to go to any of them because I had to walk my pet toaster across the Atlantic. And also when I went on the app the color theme was red white and blue and I personally think it’s should be yellow and black it’s horrible do not download it. It is repulsive

attributes.title: i hate it....absolutely horrible
attributes.review: bruh that isn’t cool dudes 👁👄👁 the minute i downloaded this app my pet rock went into cardiac arrest and proceeded to die right night to me 😭 he was mean but i still loved him....anywayzzzzz, later i went out shopping and saw a lost fish laying on the side of the road panting and begging for help....of course i helped it i’m not a monster 😌🤚 but....the second i saved that fish it looked at me and...and....i can’t-....he said.... shawdys 💞 like ❄️ a 🌸 melody 🎵 in 〰️ my 🤚 head 🤦‍♀️....i cant take it anymore....today was an awful day bc of this app
